content: pdf digital download crochet pattern - english only this is not a finished product the mauve-a-lous duster cardigan is worked in one piece from the side across it s the perfect cardigan to keep you warm and cozy basic stitches are used throughout with a simple 2 row repeat this oversized long cardi feels like a warm hug on a chilly day 36-38 length with notes to customize the length designed in ultra mellowspun dk by mary maxim a beautiful soft and light yarn shown in dark mauve video tutorial included for size medium on youtube schematics and body measuring instructions included video link https //youtu be/5eeqsuxibog finished bust inches 40 44 48 52 56 60 64 68 yarn requirements ultra mellowspun dk- 70% acrylic 30% nylon 174 yds/160m/50g/1 75oz shown in dark mauve https //shrsl com/3fxfp balls 12 13 15 16 17 18 19 20 yards 2088 2262 2610 2784 2958 3132 3306 3480 crochet hook requirements us g/6 4mm or size needed to obtain gauge us 7 4 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge https //shrsl com/3f8t6 - use code mjs15 for 15% off additional supplies yarn needle removable stitch markers blocking mat and pins or steamer gauge 20 sts and 10 row equal to 4 in half_double_crochet blo with 4mm hook 14 sts and 12 row equal to 4 in pattern with 4 5mm hook you are welcome to sell finished product from this design please reference sentry box designs as designer you must use your own photos to sell your work all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items due to the nature of patterns there are no returns or refunds all sales are final
